bill.title: Building Decarbonization Measures
bill.description: Concerning building decarbonization measures, and, in connection therewith, creating a building decarbonization enterprise and making an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Energy & Environment
House Committee on Energy & Environment Refer Amended to Finance
House Committee on Finance Refer Amended to Appropriations
House Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Finance
Senate Committee on Finance Refer Amended to Appropriations
Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Unamended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
Senate Third Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
Senate Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Laid Over Daily
Senate Recalled Bill From House
Senate Third Reading Reconsidered - No Amendments
Senate Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the President of the Senate
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Sent to the Governor
Governor Signed

votes.desc: House Energy & Environment: Adopt amendment L.001
House Energy & Environment: Refer House Bill 25-1269, as amended, to the Committee on Finance.
House Finance: Refer House Bill 25-1269, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
House Appropriations: Refer House Bill 25-1269, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate Finance: Adopt amendment L.022 (Attachment E)
Senate Appropriations: Refer House Bill 25-1269 to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate Finance: Refer House Bill 25-1269, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
